title: How does honor 0 and missions work?
body:
I recently got 14 day ban (kinda bs that i get  a 14day ban for  in 2 games saying fÂ§king idiot and %%% to trollers when I didnt have any punishments for a year) when I had honor 3 wich caused my honor to drop too 0. When I was banned I could still see my missions and even completed the mission for the poro icon (the one were u guess the results of groups) now my ban has ended, I cant see any missions nor 
 the completed ones. Is this normal and if so when will I be able to get missions again.

replies.body: Have you still not been able to see those missions? The ban might have been affecting how you could see the missions, but I do still see them active on your account right now. If you can't see them, try refreshing the client a couple times, and then shoot me a screenshot if they never show up!
